sentence.text: Breakthrough discoveries include the role of somatic variants in the potassium ion import across plasma membrane, calcium ion transport, cellular sodium ion homeostasis, and regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration genes as causes of aldosterone-producing adenomas (APAs), and the recognition of three novel hyperaldosteronism syndromes with germline variants in the KCNJ5, CACNA1D, and regulation of membrane potential genes.

entity.text: potassium ion import across plasma membrane
regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration
